item.title: draw.io
item.description: Canvas Action Keystrokes Grid (toggle) Ctrl + Shift + G Move drawing area Space + drag mouse Zoom Alt + scroll wheel Connectors Action Keystrokes Clone connectors Ctrl + Select connector’s endpoint + Drag Connect to a point within the shape Drag > hold Alt > Release mouse button at destination Add another Waypoint to connector Right-click connector > Add Waypoint Connections Floating connections connect to the frame of a shape.
